messages.subject: Re: Shinsengumi manga?
messages.msgSnippet: please visit http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3 use the password makoto for Kaze Hikaru and all files also download rare paintings and woodcuts
messages.messageBody:
please visit http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
use the password "makoto" for Kaze Hikaru and all files

also download rare paintings and woodcuts dealing with the Seinan
War...as far as I know these pics cannot be found anywhere online
(PDF format all these pics are from library books)...also got a
different pic of Toshiyoshi/Toshinaga Kawaji

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Linda Larsson <enma_o@y...> wrote:
> Hi!
>
> Looking back through the archives, there was someone who posted
about how they'd found some Shinsengumi manga (Burai and Kaze
Hikaru, and also IIRC some yaoi one called Bakumatsu) on IRC. I also
think they were sharing them over Streamload at some point.
>
> Is there anyone who has these and would be willing to share them?
Or at least point out where I can find them?
>
> Sincerely,
> Linda/enma-ou the manga fanatic
>
> Höstrusk och grå moln - köp en resa till solen på Yahoo! Resor
>

messages.subject: Shinsengumi manga?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! Looking back through the archives, there was someone who posted about how they d found some Shinsengumi manga (Burai and Kaze Hikaru, and also IIRC some
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

Looking back through the archives, there was someone who posted about how they'd found some Shinsengumi manga (Burai and Kaze Hikaru, and also IIRC some yaoi one called Bakumatsu) on IRC. I also think they were sharing them over Streamload at some point.

Is there anyone who has these and would be willing to share them? Or at least point out where I can find them?

Sincerely,
Linda/enma-ou the manga fanatic

Höstrusk och grå moln - köp en resa till solen på Yahoo! Resor

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
